channel.title: Poke ROM v0.55
channel.description: Well i started with leaf green but the format is wrong :-\ and i cant then edit shops because of the stupid format. So i scratched that and started with fire red and here is v0.2 of it, its got the first three towns/cities edited and gone through there is a secret to find in the third city if you can get to it :D and the wild pokemon and their ratios have been edited etc it doesn't have all the aesthetic changes that it will include because it is v0.2 and i am worrying about structure first :D [u][b]v0.2[/b][/u] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3EO6T2UY]Poke ROM 0.2[/url] [u][b]v0.3[/b][/u] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9BIP80GX]Poke ROM 0.3[/url] [u][b]v0.4[/b][/u] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9KT86KFU]Poke ROM 0.4[/url] [u][b]v0.5[/b][/u] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=NDHH8IKJ]Poke ROM 0.5[/url] [u][b]v0.55[/b][/u] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Q55IIYZP]Poke ROM 0.55[/url] [u]New to 0.55[/u] Pokemon secret spot picture to come :D [u]New to 0.5[/u] I don't really know myself as it has been a while but i reached the safari zone so expect to see changed up until there enjoy :D :o i forgot route 8 so don't expect that to be different :D [u]New to 0.4[/u] Route's 6,9,10 The third gym city, the name has escaped me at this present moment Weather adjustements around the third gym Fixed an Old guy he used to talk about nothing now he comments on the weather Fixed Ratios and wild pokemon around areas between Azure city and Vanilla town Weather Adjustment around Vanilla town. S.S Anne neglected(unfortunately i ran out of time will be here for v0.5 though) Rock Tunnel has had darkness cap REMOVED as i cant be bothered with the Flash hassle. Shops around third gym edited S.S Anne Ticket for sale but you still need to see bill first :P No new maps i will post some though [u]New to 0.3[/u] Fixed evolution bug on half of the new pokemon you now longer get a question mark when you evolve if you actually earnt the evolution by training. Fixed Mt.Moon ratios and '?' glitch. Removed the custom lake in Rockford as it put too much strain on emu. Those that got the secret pokemon well done those that didn't you can still get and then save the file and then use 0.3. Fixed some trainer in Azure city, he used to speak gibberish he now asks for sex :eek: New secret pokemon area. This time its just north of Azure city in the water. Find a way there. Edited the pokemon that you can capture around Azure city, route 24-25, Mt Moon and Route 4. Fixed fossil glitch now you cant get both fossils if you want both you need to buy one of em, price 8k. Fixed Rock Tunnel, flash now actually [i]does[/i] affect the place as before it didn't, mainly my fault :D Note: Made your own pokemon sprites? leave them as a reply and i will add in :D make sure it has the back and front. If you don't mind, 64x64 on paint and if you have irfan view decrease colour depth Here is a map of Azure City with the secret Pokespot there if you can work out how to get there well done :P [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/AzureMap.jpg[/img] If you really are stuck let me know and i will send you the permissions map

lol i hack pokemon roms
[/quote]
Want a medal?

Anyway. This looks quite nice - i’ll try it out sometime, whip out a emulator…[/quote]
K i suggest VBA as is definately the best, i’ve been doing heavy modification in the game but i had to actually get to that point in the game before i could modify the later bits so i’ve had to play my way through alot of it

item.title: Poke ROM v0.55
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:7, topic:199826”]I’m still at school so I can’t try it. Oh god I’m so sad to come on this place in my break times.

Thats the one - cerrulean.

You do know all the original towns are named after colors? I think you should base yours around something. Like flavours or something. Like ash can begin in strawberry town and so on. Sounds like fun =D. You should try doing what Lawl was trying to do and make it playable online against other people.[/quote]
Thats already been invented its called Pokemon: Den of Ages, besides mine could be played online if you get the VBA link which, theoretically, is fast enough for online play it is possible to make the ROM online

Read full topic

item.title: Poke ROM v0.55
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I’m still at school so I can’t try it. Oh god I’m so sad to come on this place in my break times.

Thats the one - cerrulean.

You do know all the original towns are named after colors? I think you should base yours around something. Like flavours or something. Like ash can begin in strawberry town and so on. Sounds like fun =D. You should try doing what Lawl was trying to do and make it playable online against other people.

Read full topic

item.title: Poke ROM v0.55
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:5, topic:199826”][quote author=Nashi link=topic=264477.msg2193230#msg2193230 date=1208428836]
how you do dat?
[/quote]

Lel, you get the roms, use programs to edit the game however you like (Change the tiles, properties of the environment, shop items, people dialog, pokemon sprites and the wild pokemon!!! I used to do it all the time like a loser.)

BTW, this is not programming, but I don’t where where else it should go.[/quote]
WTF is Lel? that doesn’t even make sense besides most of the actual modification is done in HEX

Read full topic

@sanga282 wrote:

Well i started with leaf green but the format is wrong :-\ and i cant then edit shops because of the stupid format. So i scratched that and started with fire red and here is v0.2 of it, its got the first three towns/cities edited and gone through there is a secret to find in the third city if you can get to it and the wild pokemon and their ratios have been edited etc it doesn’t have all the aesthetic changes that it will include because it is v0.2 and i am worrying about structure first

:o i forgot route 8 so don’t expect that to be different

Route’s 6,9,10
The third gym city, the name has escaped me at this present moment

Fixed an Old guy he used to talk about nothing now he comments on the weather
Fixed Ratios and wild pokemon around areas between Azure city and Vanilla town
Weather Adjustment around Vanilla town.
S.S Anne neglected(unfortunately i ran out of time will be here for v0.5 though)
Rock Tunnel has had darkness cap REMOVED as i cant be bothered with the Flash hassle.
Shops around third gym edited
S.S Anne Ticket for sale but you still need to see bill first
No new maps i will post some though
New to 0.3
Fixed evolution bug on half of the new pokemon you now longer get a question mark when you evolve if you actually earnt the evolution by training.
Fixed Mt.Moon ratios and ‘?’ glitch.
Removed the custom lake in Rockford as it put too much strain on emu. Those that got the secret pokemon well done those that didn’t you can still get and then save the file and then use 0.3.
Fixed some trainer in Azure city, he used to speak gibberish he now asks for sex :eek:
New secret pokemon area. This time its just north of Azure city in the water. Find a way there.
Edited the pokemon that you can capture around Azure city, route 24-25, Mt Moon and Route 4.
Fixed fossil glitch now you cant get both fossils if you want both you need to buy one of em, price 8k.
Fixed Rock Tunnel, flash now actually does affect the place as before it didn’t, mainly my fault
Note: Made your own pokemon sprites? leave them as a reply and i will add in make sure it has the back and front. If you don’t mind, 64x64 on paint and if you have irfan view decrease colour depth
Here is a map of Azure City with the secret Pokespot there if you can work out how to get there well done

AzureMap.jpg779×639

If you really are stuck let me know and i will send you the permissions map
